info.task: navigate backwards to collapsed select-only combobox
info.title: Navigate backwards to a collapsed select-only combobox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the Combobox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the Combobox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Text of the selected option ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
